meta.description: Optimize the number of regular and speed boat trips to minimize gas consumption while delivering mail.

sets.name: BOAT_TYPES
sets.description: Types of boats used for mail delivery.

params.name: mail_capacity
params.description: Mail carrying capacity per trip for each boat type.

params.name: gas_usage
params.description: Gas usage per trip for each boat type.

params.name: max_regular_trips
params.description: Maximum number of trips that can be made by regular boats.

params.name: total_mail
params.description: Total pieces of mail that need to be delivered.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each type of boat.

objective.name: min_total_gas
objective.expr: sum(trips[b] * gas_usage[b] for b in BOAT_TYPES)
objective.description: Minimize the total gas consumption for all trips.

constraints.name: mail_delivery_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure that the total mail delivered meets or exceeds the requirement.

constraints.name: max_regular_trips_constraint
constraints.description: Limit the number of regular boat trips to the maximum allowed.

constraints.name: speed_boat_trip_requirement
constraints.description: At least 50% of the trips must be made by speed boats.
